artist: Artist: Utagawa Hiroshige III; Publisher: Naraha Shūbei
description: three sheets make up image of view of a Western-style brick building with two levels; large fountain in foreground surrounded by figures in Western and Japanese gaments from accordion-folded album with black soft cover
markings: 出版人新いづミ町壱番地　楢葉周兵衛　画工南こんや町廿七番地　安藤徳兵衛; 御届明治十四年三月
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
portfolio: From Famous Places in Tokyo (Tōkyō meisho 東京名所)
title: View of the Art Museum at the Second National Industrial Exposition in Ueno Park
